metadata.title: CVE-2018-21247 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. There is aninformation leak (of uninitialized memory contents) in thelibvncclient/rfbproto.c ConnectToRFBRepeater function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
x11vnc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
